name: The Woodland Manoir
description:
DESCRIPTION
Do you dream of nature and greenery to celebrate one of the happiest days of your life?
The Woodland Manoir located in the center of France at 1h45 from Paris will bring you the calm and serenity necessary for the smooth running of your festivities. Let yourself be enchanted and seduced by this reception venue ...
The stretch tent of 280 m² will allow you to receive up to 220 seated people. Fully equipped with sound and lighting equipment, video projector with white screen and even tables and chairs, this place has all the necessary comfort.
The Woodland Manoir team will be delighted to assist you in your preparations. We can share our address book with you and advise you as you wish whilst sharing our knowledge of the area and the amazing local suppliers and what they have to offer.
You will also have the opportunity to organize your ceremony outdoors with a breathtaking view of this wedding venue! With the stunning woodland and lake for a backdrop it is truly breathtaking.
You will have use of accommodation within the house, including 4 double bedrooms, which is fully equipped and has a space for breakfast for your guests to use throughout their stay. In total you will have 23 bedrooms each with its own bathroom for a maximum capacity of 46 beds.
The price for a weekend (Friday 4 pm until Sunday 4 pm) is 12000€. We can offer special prices for weekdays (between Monday 4 pm and Thursday 4 pm) depending on the number of guests so please get in touch for more information.
If you are interested in getting some more information on this venue then please do get in touch and we will be more than happy to help answer any questions you may have.
additional_info:
FEATURES
Golf course nearby
Internet access
Baby friendly (cots, changing facilities)
Hotel recommendation list
Marquee available on site
Recommended wedding planner
Recommended suppliers list available
Recommended caterer
Nearest Airport
